title: It’s Important To Come Prepared
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>We’re going live in 3, 2, 1....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Hello everyone, Yuki Setsuna here. It’s still really hot outside, but are you suffering from summer fatigue already? In today’s stream, we’re going to make a “special smoothie” to help you stay healthy and energetic! We also have a special guest today. It’s Ruby-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Hello, Kurosawa Ruby from Aqours here. Ruby will do my Rubesty to make the smoothie!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’m looking forward to working with you today, Ruby-san! Alright, first will be our ingredients for the smoothie. We have spinach, bananas, kiwis, and chili pep-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>S-, Setsuna-san!! Ruby thinks we should add Japanese mustard spinach!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah, that would be good too, let’s add it! After that, we should....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>After that, we should add some water and put the ingredients in the mixer, right!? Here’s some water!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Waah, thank you! Now, before putting them in the mixer, we should chop up the vegeta-<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>H-, here’s some vegetable that has been cut earlier....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ruby-san.... I can’t believe you’ve prepared all of these....! Let’s make this the tastiest smoothie together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
